>
[Dawnflower Beads](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2394)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="No Alignment" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />

<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 194 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +20; [precise](/Rules.aspx?ID=411) vision 30 feet, [imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412) hearing 30 feet

**Communication** speech ([Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), and two other common languages)

**Skills** [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +21, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +22, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19, [Sarenrae Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +23

**Int** +2, **Wis** +5, **Cha** +4

**Will** +20 

</column>

---        

Prayer beads given prolonged exposure to spiritual energies at sacred [Sarenite](/Deities.aspx?ID=16) sites can attain sapience as _Dawnflower beads_. Other such objects hold the spirits of Sarenite priests who dedicated themselves to their work beyond death. _Dawnflower beads_ function as [_greater holy prayer beads_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=256). They don't re-attune to other deities but allow any good or neutral divine spellcaster to use them, though they attempt to talk their wielder out of morally questionable acts. Add [_positive luminance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=439) to the beads' spell list, available to be cast once per day. Dawnflower beads also have the following activation.
